questions.question_text: What type of error does the red exclamation mark in Validation Station or Action Center throw?

choices.B: It is calculated by counting the total number of messages in a thread and multiplying it by a fixed amount of time.
choices.D: It is calculated by taking the difference between the timestamps of the first message and the second message sent in the thread.
choices.A: It is calculated by taking the difference between the timestamps of the first message and the last message sent by the same participant within a thread.
choices.C: It is calculated by taking the time between the first and the last message that was sent in the thread.
